subject: Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Preakness Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The plan for I’ll Have Another, who arrived at Belmont Park on Sunday afternoon after winning the Preakness the day before, is to get him acclimated to the racetrack.
snippet: The plan for I’ll Have Another, who arrived at Belmont Park on Sunday afternoon after winning the Preakness the day before, is to get him acclimated to the racetrack.
